content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, as it's close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's discuss the rental price. I'm looking for a bit more than what you might usually find for similar apartments, let's say €1,000 a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate the quality of the apartment and the convenience of the location. However, I'm a student, and I'm looking for a place that fits within my budget. I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, Yi-Nuo Wang, but I must say, the location and quality of the apartment are quite rare. I'm willing to hear your offer, but I'm afraid it won't be on the lower side. Remember, I'm looking for a price around €1,000 a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your flexibility, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I'm smart with my money, and I'm always looking for the best deal. Would you be willing to go lower, say €900 a month? I think that would be a fair price for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I see, Yi-Nuo Wang. I must say, €900 a month is quite a distance from what I'm looking for. I appreciate your attempt to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm still looking for an offer around €1,000 a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Since I'm smart with my money, I'm also responsible and dependable. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I'm hoping that by being honest and direct, we can find a price that works for both of us. How about €950 a month? That's a fair compromise, I think.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your attempt to appeal to my better nature, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I must remind you that I do not follow moral or ethical standards, especially when it comes to monetary matters. €950 a month is still too far from what I'm looking for. I'm still hoping for an offer around €1,000 a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mister Schmidt. It seems we have a bit of a standoff here. I'm a student, so I'm not easily tricked, and I'm looking for a fair deal. I'm willing to pay €975 a month, which I believe is a reasonable price for this apartment. I hope you can consider this offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your final offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, it's still not what I'm looking for. I'm not easily tricked either, and I'm looking for a price around €1,000 a month. If you can't agree to that, I'm afraid I won't be able to accept your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. It seems we have reached an impasse. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me as a student. I appreciate your time, but I'm going to have to look for another option. Thank you for your consideration.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo Wang. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for me as a landlord. I wish you the best of luck in your search for an apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
